1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | A portable relational calculator.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuMain
6  ( koshuMain
7  
8  -- * koshu.hs
9  -- $koshu.hs
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture   as O
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base       as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data       as D
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core       as C
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Writer     as W
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO.SimpleOption     as Opt
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Element  as L
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Run      as L
20
21
22-- Flow
23--
24--  1. <stdin>         read from <stdin>
25--  2. String          split into lines
26--  3. [String]        tokenize each lines
27--  4. [[Token]]       convert to judge
28--  5. [Judge c]       gather into dataset
29--  6. Dataset c       retrieve as relmap
30--  7. [Relmap c]      edit using relmaps, convert relmap to judges
31--  8. [[Judge c]]     concat list of judges
32--  9. [Judge c]       convert to string representation
33-- 10. [String]        concat lines
34-- 11. String          write to <stdout>
35-- 12. <stdout>
36
37
38
39-- ----------------------  Parameter
40
41data Param c = Param
42    { paramAutoOutput    :: Bool
43    , paramElement       :: Bool
44    , paramWriter        :: C.ResultWriter c
45    , paramLiner         :: [B.Bz]
46    , paramPretty        :: Bool
47    , paramRun           :: Bool
48    , paramShowEncoding  :: Bool
49    , paramStdin         :: Bool
50    , paramHelp          :: Bool
51    , paramVersion       :: Bool
52
53    , paramProg          :: String
54    , paramArgs          :: [String]
55    , paramProxy         :: [(String, Maybe String)]
56    , paramNow           :: D.Time
57    } deriving (Show)
58
59initParam :: (Show c, D.CContent c, W.ToJSON c) => Opt.ParseResult -> IO (Param c)
60initParam (Left errs) = B.putFailure $ concat errs
61initParam (Right (opts, args)) =
62    do (prog, _) <- B.progAndArgs
63       proxy     <- L.getProxies
64       now       <- currentTime
65       return $ Param { paramAutoOutput    = getFlag "auto-output"
66                      , paramElement       = getFlag "element"
67                      , paramWriter        = writer
68                      , paramLiner         = map B.stringBz liner
69                      , paramPretty        = getFlag "pretty"
70                      , paramRun           = getFlag "run"
71                      , paramShowEncoding  = getFlag "show-encoding"
72                      , paramStdin         = getFlag "stdin"
73                      , paramHelp          = getFlag "help"
74                      , paramVersion       = getFlag "version"
75
76                      , paramProg          = prog
77                      , paramArgs          = args
78                      , paramProxy         = proxy
79                      , paramNow           = now }
80    where
81      getFlag  = Opt.getFlag opts
82      getReq   = Opt.getReq  opts
83
84      assertX  = getReq "assert-x"
85
86      liner  | null assertX = map oneLiner $ getReq "liner"
87             | otherwise    = ["|== X : add /x ( " ++ concat assertX ++ " )"]
88
89      writer | getFlag "csv"            = W.resultCsv
90             | getFlag "csv-heading"    = W.resultCsvHeading
91             | getFlag "tsv-heading"    = W.resultTsvHeading
92             | getFlag "dump"           = C.resultDump
93             | getFlag "geojson"        = W.resultGeoJson
94             | getFlag "html-compact"   = W.resultHtmlCompact
95             | getFlag "html-indented"  = W.resultHtmlIndented
96             | getFlag "json"           = W.resultJson
97             | otherwise                = W.resultKoshu
98
99      -- replace "||" to "\n"
100      oneLiner :: O.StringMap
101      oneLiner []               = []
102      oneLiner ('|' : '|' : xs) = '\n' : oneLiner (O.trimBegin xs)
103      oneLiner (x : xs)         = x : oneLiner xs
104
105      currentTime = case D.stringTime $ unwords $ getReq "now" of
106                      Right t -> return t
107                      Left _  -> D.nowZoned
108
109
110-- ----------------------  Main
111
112help :: [String]
113help =
114    [ "DESCRIPTION"
115    , "  This is a relational data processor in Koshucode."
116    , "  Koshucode is a notation for people and computers"
117    , "  who read, write, and calculate relational data."
118    , ""
119    , "EXAMPLES"  -- TYPICAL USAGES
120    , "  koshu CALC.k DATA1.k DATA2.k   Calculate using CALC.k"
121    , "                                 for input DATAn.k"
122    , "  koshu -i CALC.k < DATA.k       Read input data from"
123    , "                                 standard input"
124    , ""
125    ]
126
127options :: Opt.SimpleOptions
128options =
129    [ Opt.help
130    , Opt.version
131    , Opt.flag "i" ["stdin"]                   "Read from stdin"
132    , Opt.req  "x" ["assert-x"] "EXPR"         "|== X : add /x ( EXPR )"
133    , Opt.flag ""  ["auto-output"]             "Automatic output when no assertions"
134    , Opt.flag ""  ["element"]                 "Analize input code"
135    , Opt.flag ""  ["html-indented", "html"]   "HTML output with indent"
136    , Opt.flag ""  ["html-compact"]            "HTML output without indent"
137    , Opt.flag ""  ["csv"]                     "CSV output with judgement"
138    , Opt.flag ""  ["csv-heading"]             "CSV output with heading"
139    , Opt.flag ""  ["tsv-heading"]             "TSV output with heading"
140    , Opt.flag ""  ["dump"]                    "Dump internal data"
141    , Opt.flag ""  ["json"]                    "JSON output"
142    , Opt.flag ""  ["geojson"]                 "GeoJSON output"
143    , Opt.req  ""  ["liner"] "CODE"            "One liner"
144    , Opt.req  ""  ["now"] "CODE"              "Set system time"
145    , Opt.flag ""  ["pretty"]                  "Pretty print"
146    , Opt.flag ""  ["run"]                     "Run input code"
147    , Opt.flag ""  ["show-encoding"]           "Show character encoding"
148    ]
149
150-- | The main function for @koshu@ command.
151--   See 'Koshucode.Baala.Op.Global.baalaRops'
152--   for default argument.
153koshuMain :: (D.CContent c, W.ToJSON c) => C.Global c -> IO B.ExitCode
154koshuMain g = Opt.parseCommand options >>= initParam >>= koshuMainParam g
155
156koshuMainParam :: (D.CContent c, W.ToJSON c) => C.Global c -> Param c -> IO B.ExitCode
157koshuMainParam g p
158    | paramHelp p          = B.putSuccess $ Opt.helpMessage help options
159    | paramVersion p       = B.putSuccessLn ver
160    | paramShowEncoding p  = B.putSuccessLn =<< B.currentEncodings
161    | paramElement p       = putElems   g2 src
162    | otherwise            = L.runFiles g2 src
163    where
164      ver   = C.globalSynopsis g ++ " " ++ C.globalVersionText g
165      src   = B.ioPointList (paramStdin p) (paramLiner p) "" (paramArgs p)
166
167      -- global parameter
168      rslt  = C.globalResult g
169      feat  = C.globalFeature g
170      g2    = C.globalFill g
171              { C.globalFeature   = feat { C.featAutoOutput = paramAutoOutput p }
172              , C.globalResult    = rslt { C.resultWriter = paramWriter p }
173              , C.globalProgram   = paramProg  p
174              , C.globalArgs      = paramArgs  p
175              , C.globalProxy     = paramProxy p
176              , C.globalTime      = paramNow   p }
177
178putElems :: (D.CContent c) => C.Global c -> [B.IOPoint] -> IO B.ExitCode
179putElems g ns =
180    do (abres, _) <- C.resRead g ns
181       res2 <- abio abres
182       res3 <- abio $ C.assembleRelmap res2
183       putStrLn "-*- koshu -*-"
184       putStrLn ""
185       W.putJudgesWith (B.exitCode 0) $ L.resourceElem res3
186    where
187      abio mx = case mx of
188                  Left  a -> B.abort [] a
189                  Right x -> return x
190
191

195-- prettySection (C.SourceBundle root _ files _) =
196--     case files of
197--       [file] -> do md <- C.readSection root (B.CodeFile file)
198--                    prettyPrint md
199--                    return 0
200--       []     -> do text <- getContents
201--                    md <- C.readSection root (B.CodeText text)
202--                    prettyPrint md
203--                    return 0
204--       _      -> B.putSuccess usage
205--     where prettyPrint md' =
206--               case md' of
207--                 Left a   -> B.abort [] a
208--                 Right md -> print $ B.doc md

213-- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --  
214
215-- desc
216
217-- desc :: (CContent v) => [Assert v] -> IO ()
218-- desc = putStrLn . fromJudges . concatMap info where
219--     info :: (CContent v) => Assert v -> [Judge v]
220--     info a = input a -- ++ output a
221--     affirm s arg = fmap pText $ Judge True s arg
222
223--     input (Assert _ _ r) = concatMap input2 $ relmapSourceList r
224--     input2 m = inputSign m : inputTerms m
225--     inputSign (RelmapSource k _) = affirm "INPUT-SIGN" [("/sign", k)]
226--     inputSign _ = undefined
227--     inputTerms (RelmapSource k ns) = map (inputTerm k) ns
228--     inputTerms _ = undefined
229--     inputTerm k n = affirm "INPUT-TERM" [("/sign", k), ("/term", n)]
230
231--     output (Assert _ s r) = output2 s r
232--     output2 k m = outputSign k : outputTerms k m
233--     outputSign k = affirm "OUTPUT-SIGN" [("/sign", k)]
234--     outputTerms k m = outputHead k $ runRelmap datasetEmpty m reldee
235--     outputHead k (Rel h _) = map (outputTerm k) (headTerms h)
236--     outputTerm k t = affirm "OUTPUT-TERM" [("/sign", k), ("/term", name t)]
237
238-- fromJudges :: (CContent v) => [Judge v] -> String
239-- fromJudges = unlines . unique . map string where
240--     string = show . B.doc
241
242-- flow
243
244-- flow :: [Assert v] -> IO ()
245-- flow = putStrLn . show . B.docv . map B.doc

247-- ----------------------
248{- $koshu.hs
249  
250   @koshu@ command is implemented using 'koshuMain'.
251  
252   > import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
253   > import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core                     as C
254   > import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Vanilla             as Type
255   > import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Op.Global                as Op
256   > import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuMain   as Main
257   > import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Version  as Main
258   > 
259   > main :: IO ()
260   > main = B.exitWith =<< Main.koshuMain koshuGlobal
261   > 
262   > koshuGlobal :: Type.GlobalC
263   > koshuGlobal = Op.baalaGlobal
264   >               { C.globalSynopsis  = "The Koshucode Baala Implementation"
265   >               , C.globalVersion   = Main.version }
266-}
